trans-unit.source: Specifies a portion of the list view item from which to retrieve the bounding rectangle.
Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
This enumeration is also used when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class.
The bounding rectangle of the entire item, including the icon, the item text, and the subitem text (if displayed), should be retrieved.
The bounding rectangle of the icon or small icon should be retrieved.
The bounding rectangle of the icon or small icon and the item text should be retrieved.

In all views except the details view of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>, this value specifies the same bounding rectangle as the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""></xref> value.
In details view, this value specifies the bounding rectangle specified by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""></xref> value without the subitems.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, this property does not include the area of the check boxes in its bounding rectangle. To include the entire item, including the check boxes, use the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""></xref> value when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect*> method.
The bounding rectangle of the item text should be retrieved.
